plot: Peter Wath travels from Moscow to Beijing, through the Mongolian Steppes. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
title: DR-Explorer: Den transsibiriske jernbane
plot_es: Peter Wath travels from Moscow to Beijing, through the Mongolian Steppes. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
plot_en: Peter Wath travels from Moscow to Beijing, through the Mongolian Steppes. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
